message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider something closer to $60?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $140, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate you coming down, Alice, but $140 is still more than I'm comfortable with. Could we meet in the middle somewhere, maybe around $85?
I can see you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $120.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be honest, I have another offer for $80. If you can match that, I'll buy it from you right now.
I understand you have another offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'll try to meet you halfway from my last offer, so I can offer it to you for $110.
